ACK.Name: Acknowledgment Entry
ACK.Description: A non-monetary entry used to acknowledge the receipt of a CCD credit payment, often for corporate disbursement purposes.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of acknowledgment transaction, such as '22' for credit to a corporate account.

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Receiver's account number at the receiving financial institution.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically left blank.

IndividualIdentificationNumber.Name: Individual Identification Number
IndividualIdentificationNumber.Description: Unique identifier assigned by the originator for tracking purposes.

IndividualName.Name: Individual Name
IndividualName.Description: Name of the entity associated with the acknowledgment entry.

DiscretionaryData.Name: Discretionary Data
DiscretionaryData.Description: Optional field for use by the originator; typically left blank.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' indicating no addenda record is present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

ADV.Name: Automated Accounting Advice
ADV.Description: Used by financial institutions to exchange non-monetary advice entries, often for recording accounting information or interbank settlements.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Code indicating the type of non-monetary advice transaction (e.g., '21' for credit advice, '22' for debit advice).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the financial institution receiving the advice entry.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Account number used by the receiving DFI to track or process the advice entry.

Amount.Name: Amount
Amount.Description: Transaction amount in cents (no decimal). Used for advice entries, even though they are non-monetary.

AdviceNumber.Name: Advice Number
AdviceNumber.Description: Unique identifier assigned to the advice entry for tracking purposes.

AdviceDescription.Name: Advice Description
AdviceDescription.Description: Description of the advice entry, such as 'Interbank Settlement'.

DiscretionaryData.Name: Discretionary Data
DiscretionaryData.Description: Optional field for internal use by the financial institution.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '1' if addenda is present, '0' if no addenda.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originating institution.

ATX.Name: Financial EDI Acknowledgment
ATX.Description: A non-monetary acknowledgment entry used to confirm the receipt of a financial EDI transaction, typically in business-to-business exchanges.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of acknowledgment transaction, such as '22' for a credit acknowledgment or '27' for a debit acknowledgment.

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the financial institution receiving the acknowledgment.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the receiving DFI's routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Account number used by the receiving DFI to track or process the acknowledgment entry.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically left blank.

IndividualIdentificationNumber.Name: Individual Identification Number
IndividualIdentificationNumber.Description: Unique identifier assigned by the originator for tracking the acknowledgment.

IndividualName.Name: Individual Name
IndividualName.Description: Name of the individual or entity associated with the acknowledgment entry.

DiscretionaryData.Name: Discretionary Data
DiscretionaryData.Description: Optional field for use by the originator; typically left blank.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' indicating no addenda record is present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator for the acknowledgment.

PPD.Name: Prearranged Payment and Deposit Entry
PPD.Description: Used for direct deposit (credit) or preauthorized bill payments (debit) for consumer accounts.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Identifies the type of transaction (e.g., credit to checking account).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving bank.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the receiving bank's routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Receiver's account number at the receiving bank.

IndividualIdentificationNumber.Name: Individual Identification Number
IndividualIdentificationNumber.Description: Identification number for the receiver (e.g., employee ID).

DiscretionaryData.Name: Discretionary Data
DiscretionaryData.Description: Optional field for use by the originator.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique number assigned for tracking by the originator.

CCD.Name: Corporate Credit or Debit Entry
CCD.Description: Used for corporate payments, such as vendor payments, payroll funding, and tax payments.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Identifies the type of transaction (credit or debit).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the receiving DFI's routing number.

IdentificationNumber.Name: Identification Number
IdentificationNumber.Description: Receiver’s identification number, such as invoice number.

ReceivingCompanyName.Name: Receiving Company Name
ReceivingCompanyName.Description: Name of the receiving corporate entity.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically blank.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Tracking number assigned by the originator.

CTX.Name: Corporate Trade Exchange
CTX.Description: Used for complex corporate payments, supporting multiple addenda records for detailed remittance information.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Type of transaction (e.g., corporate debit or credit).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Receiving bank's routing number.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

IdentificationNumber.Name: Identification Number
IdentificationNumber.Description: Receiver identification, such as an invoice number.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically blank.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique number for tracking.

WEB.Name: Internet-Initiated/Mobile Entries
WEB.Description: Used for debit or credit entries authorized over the internet or mobile devices.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Identifies the transaction type (debit or credit).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving bank.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique number assigned for tracking.

TEL.Name: Telephone-Initiated Entry
TEL.Description: Used for ACH debit entries authorized over the telephone.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Transaction type identifier.

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving bank.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for routing number verification.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

ARC.Name: Accounts Receivable Entry
ARC.Description: Used for converting consumer checks received by mail or at a dropbox into ACH debit transactions.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., debit to consumer checking).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

IndividualIdentificationNumber.Name: Individual Identification Number
IndividualIdentificationNumber.Description: Optional identifier for the receiver (e.g., check number).

IndividualName.Name: Individual Name
IndividualName.Description: Name of the check writer or receiver.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

BOC.Name: Back Office Conversion Entry
BOC.Description: Used for converting checks received at the point of sale or manned bill payment locations into ACH debit transactions, which are then processed in the back office.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., consumer debit to checking account).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

CheckSerialNumber.Name: Check Serial Number
CheckSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the check being converted to ACH.

IndividualName.Name: Individual Name
IndividualName.Description: Name of the check writer or receiver.

DiscretionaryData.Name: Discretionary Data
DiscretionaryData.Description: Optional field for use by the originator.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

POP.Name: Point-of-Purchase Entry
POP.Description: Used for converting checks presented in person at the point of sale into ACH debit transactions.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., consumer debit to checking account).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

CheckSerialNumber.Name: Check Serial Number
CheckSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the check being converted to ACH.

TerminalCity.Name: Terminal City
TerminalCity.Description: City where the point-of-purchase terminal is located.

TerminalState.Name: Terminal State
TerminalState.Description: State where the point-of-purchase terminal is located.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

RCK.Name: Re-presented Check Entry
RCK.Description: Used to re-present a check that was returned due to insufficient or uncollected funds as an ACH debit.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., debit to consumer checking).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

CheckSerialNumber.Name: Check Serial Number
CheckSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the check being re-presented as an ACH entry.

ItemTypeIndicator.Name: Item Type Indicator
ItemTypeIndicator.Description: Indicates the type of item being re-presented; 'R' for re-presented checks.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

CIE.Name: Customer Initiated Entry
CIE.Description: Used for consumer-initiated credit entries, typically to pay bills through a bank's online bill payment service.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Identifies the type of transaction (e.g., credit to consumer checking account).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the receiving bank's routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Receiver's account number at the receiving bank.

IndividualIdentificationNumber.Name: Individual Identification Number
IndividualIdentificationNumber.Description: Identification number for the transaction, typically assigned by the consumer.

IndividualName.Name: Individual Name
IndividualName.Description: Name of the individual or entity making the payment.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

IAT.Name: International ACH Transaction
IAT.Description: Used for ACH entries destined for or originating from financial institutions outside the U.S.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., international credit or debit).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the U.S. correspondent bank.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the U.S. correspondent bank's routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Receiver's account number at the foreign financial institution.

ForeignExchangeIndicator.Name: Foreign Exchange Indicator
ForeignExchangeIndicator.Description: Indicates whether foreign exchange is involved ('FX' for yes, 'FF' for no).

ForeignExchangeReferenceIndicator.Name: Foreign Exchange Reference Indicator
ForeignExchangeReferenceIndicator.Description: Indicates the type of reference for the exchange rate (e.g., '1' for fixed).

ForeignExchangeReference.Name: Foreign Exchange Reference
ForeignExchangeReference.Description: Specifies the exchange rate if applicable.

ISOOriginatingCurrencyCode.Name: ISO Originating Currency Code
ISOOriginatingCurrencyCode.Description: ISO currency code of the originating currency (e.g., 'USD').

ISODestinationCurrencyCode.Name: ISO Destination Currency Code
ISODestinationCurrencyCode.Description: ISO currency code of the destination currency.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '1' indicating the presence of addenda records with IAT transactions.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

MTE.Name: Machine Transfer Entry
MTE.Description: Used for ACH entries initiated through an ATM or similar device, typically for transferring funds or withdrawals.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., ATM withdrawal or transfer).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

TerminalIDCode.Name: Terminal ID Code
TerminalIDCode.Description: Identifier for the ATM or terminal where the transaction was initiated.

TransactionSerialNumber.Name: Transaction Serial Number
TransactionSerialNumber.Description: Unique identifier for the transaction at the terminal.

TransactionDate.Name: Transaction Date
TransactionDate.Description: Date of the transaction in 'YYMMDD' format.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

POS.Name: Point-of-Sale Entry
POS.Description: Used for ACH debit entries initiated at a point-of-sale (POS) terminal, typically for purchases.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., debit to consumer checking).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

TerminalIDCode.Name: Terminal ID Code
TerminalIDCode.Description: Unique identifier for the POS terminal.

TransactionSerialNumber.Name: Transaction Serial Number
TransactionSerialNumber.Description: Unique identifier for the transaction at the POS.

TransactionDate.Name: Transaction Date
TransactionDate.Description: Date of the transaction in 'YYMMDD' format.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

SHR.Name: Shared Network Transaction
SHR.Description: Used for ACH debit entries within a shared network, commonly used for ATM transactions.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., debit to consumer checking).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

TerminalIDCode.Name: Terminal ID Code
TerminalIDCode.Description: Unique identifier for the ATM or terminal where the transaction was initiated.

TransactionSerialNumber.Name: Transaction Serial Number
TransactionSerialNumber.Description: Unique identifier for the transaction within the shared network.

TransactionDate.Name: Transaction Date
TransactionDate.Description: Date of the transaction in 'YYMMDD' format.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

TRC.Name: Truncated Entry
TRC.Description: Used for ACH debit entries in a shared truncated check processing system.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., debit to consumer checking).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

CheckSerialNumber.Name: Check Serial Number
CheckSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the check being truncated.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

TRX.Name: Truncated Entries Exchange
TRX.Description: Used for exchanging truncated check entries between financial institutions.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction (e.g., debit to consumer checking).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

CheckSerialNumber.Name: Check Serial Number
CheckSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the check being truncated.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda, '1' if addenda are present.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

XCK.Name: Destroyed Check Entry
XCK.Description: Used to create an ACH debit entry for checks that have been destroyed, allowing the transaction to be processed without the physical check.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of debit transaction (e.g., code '27' for debit to checking).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the receiving DFI's routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Receiver's account number at the receiving financial institution.

CheckSerialNumber.Name: Check Serial Number
CheckSerialNumber.Description: Serial number of the destroyed check.

IndividualName.Name: Individual Name
IndividualName.Description: Name of the individual or entity associated with the check.

DiscretionaryData.Name: Discretionary Data
DiscretionaryData.Description: Optional field for use by the originator; typically left blank.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '0' if no addenda is present; '1' if an addenda is included.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator.

COR.Name: Notification of Change
COR.Description: Used to notify the originator of a correction needed in the recipient's account information, such as a new routing or account number.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed value '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Specifies the type of transaction; for COR, it is often '21' for notifications.

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Check digit for the routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Receiver's account number at the receiving financial institution.

Reserved.Name: Reserved
Reserved.Description: Reserved for future use; typically left blank.

IndividualName.Name: Individual Name
IndividualName.Description: Name of the individual or entity associated with the change notification.

Reserved2.Name: Reserved
Reserved2.Description: Reserved for future use; typically left blank.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: '1' indicating the presence of an Addenda Record (required for COR).

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique tracking number assigned by the originator for the original transaction.
